text: Islam Bibi (; 1974 â€“ 4 July 2013) was a female police officer from Afghanistan in the province of Helmand headquarters. She was also a pioneer in fighting for the rights of women in the country. She was the highest ranking policewoman at the time of her death in Afghanistan and led operations against the Talibans. She received many death threats and was killed on July 4, 2013. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2013 deaths Category:21st-century Afghan people Category:Police officers Category:2010s murders in Asia Category:Murder in 2013 Category:Helmand Province Category:Incidents of violence against women
title: Islam Bibi
